pageContext.claim: “According to NBC News, Voters Nationwide Disapprove of the so-called Mueller Investigation (46%) more than they Approve (41%). You mean they are finally beginning to understand what a disgusting Witch Hunt, led by 17 Angry Democrats, is all about!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to an election exit poll from NBC, in which 45 percent said they disapproved of the special counsel investigation. That's not a majority; 42 percent approved and 13 percent were not in either camp. Other polls have shown higher levels of approval for Mueller's investigation.
